import React, { Component } from 'react' import {NavLink, Route ,Switch,Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import About from "./pages/About" import Home from "./pages/Home" import Header from "./components/Header/index.jsx" export default class App extends Component { render() { return (
About Home { /* About */} { /* Home */}
{/*注册路由*/} {/*switch 的作用是当匹配到一个路径正确 的路由时结束匹配，提高效率，不在往下寻找 */} {/**当路由不是以上所有路由中的一个时，用redirect设置兜底路由地址 */}
)}}
